Failure Tables
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Failure Tables
By torey luvullo on Sunday, July 21, 2002 - 04:02 pm:

There are two failure reactions for every monster. In order to keep my monster as close to "normal" as possible, i started keeping track of which reaction was which, and what my response should be. To summarize, when the monster shows the "type A" reaction, i say "try harder" in order to get fleria to say, "it looks like it is regretting what it did". When the monster shows the "type B" reaction, i say "keep at it" so fleria says, "it looks like it is ready for next time". Let's do that part as a table:

Failure typeWhat Fleria says"try harder""keep at it"
A"___ didn't finish the training completely""it looks like it is regretting what it did""it looks relieved"
B"looks like ____ didn't do very well""that's a little harsh but it's for _____'s own good right?""it looks like its ready for next time"


Fleria's words are always indicative, so if you hear what she says, you always know how to respond. In case you miss them, here are descriptions of "type A" and "type B" reactions for 27 out of the 30 breeds. baku, durahan and hare have reactions that are very much alike for each failure type; if someone lets me know a key to look for, i will incorporate it into the table.

Breed Type A Type B
Baku ******
Beaklonleans back...head up...slowly shakes headhead down...head bobs up and down
ColorPandorarolls overrocks back and forth
Dakkungleans back and throws head backleans to left and bobs head slowly
Dragonlooks off to one sidehead down facing front
Durahan******
Gitanhead becomes lowest part...ears and tail flapsface forward...bobs head...shakes ears and tail
Golemstands straight head backhangs head and bobs it up and down
Hare******
Hengarclunks to the groundfloats in the air
Jellprickly headmelts into blob
Jokerscythe/hammer down to groundscythe/hammer raised
Lesioneeyes closed...flat on groundeyes open...head bobs up and down
Mewsits with beady eyesleans forward with eyes like X's
Mocchihead down and mouth movinghead bobbing with mouth opening and closing a lot
Mogihead down and shaking side to sidearms move up and down and head shakes in rythym
Momocries with half ball in each pawlooks down with ball together in one paw
Nagalooks to one side with one arm on hiplooks ahead with both arms down
Octopeehead swells and distortsjust stands there with eyes darting
Ogyodrops to ground and moves one arm/flipperbent at middle with head down and tail and antenna dragging
Panchoeyes like "u u" and whole shell rockseyes like >< and top of shell goes up and down
Pixiestands straightbends at waist
Plantsits down and flower goes slightly off stem then backflower bends backward
Psirollerfalls off wheelhead on wheel hands on side and back end draggin off wheel
Raidencrouchesstands straight
Suezohead swells up tongue outhead down tongue out
Suzurinpicks petals off flowerlays on ground
Tigerjumps and bites upward right and leftgets down on haunches
Zanstands sideways arms crossed hand almost on chinstands facing front arms crossed hand almost on thigh
Zoomsits downhead looks to its left


*** = i cannot distinguish a difference.

I will leave this in Misc Q&A for questions, comments and criticisms for a while. eventually, it will move to the faq section.
